definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: causat. (NH id., be foul, Pi. make foul; Aram. [[זְהִים]] foul, zhem make foul, fetid; Ar. zahima stink, be greasy)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. sf. 3 ms. [[וְזִהֲמַתּוּ חַיׇּתוֹ לָָחֶם]] (consec.) Job 33:20 his life maketh it, bread, loathsome to him (‖[[ונפשׁו מַאֲכַל תַּאֲוׇה]]) (On sf. v. Ges:§ 131, 2, R. 4; Dr:1Sa 21:14: acc. to Siegf the word is hopelessly corrupt.)
